name: Medieval village
description:
Have fun.

ATTENTION! PLAY IT ON FULLSCREEN!

Game informations:

- Moving with WASD

- You can end the day by going to you home 

- The main game mechanic is journal 

- Your village can not produce metal and gold. You can only borrow them from oher villages.

- Villages will answer you next day.

-  You will win when you finish all projects.

-  You when lose when you do not have enough food. 

-if you want to stop talking to villagers just go away from them

- if you don't want to end the day just go away from your house 

- if you wand to start project and it won't do anything you don't have enough    resources ,same with trading
